actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to exchange certain public lands in Mesa County, Colorado.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to exchange specified lands in Mesa County, Colorado, to the Ute Water Conservancy District for other lands to be agreed upon by the Secretary and such District.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to exchange certain public lands in Mesa County, Colorado.
